about_the_game:
Year 1823. Northern Yakutia.

Young naval officer Nikolai Trofimov embarks on a perilous journey to the edge of the known world in search of his missing father. His quest leads him deep into the icy tundra and toward the legendary Sannikov Land — a mythical island of eternal peace and prosperity.

As Nikolai ventures further north, aided by the resilience of his companions — both human and animal — he begins to uncover secrets that blur the lines between myth and reality. In this unforgiving wilderness, the past is as alive as the spirits that haunt it.

HUNT, SURVIVE, AND MASTER THE WILDS

Yakutia's wilderness is teeming with life, but survival demands skill and determination. Each of the four regions holds its own unique fauna — from elusive animals to prized fish — waiting to challenge even the most seasoned hunter.

BUILD THE ULTIMATE DOG SLED

Survival in the Far North depends on preparation and ingenuity. Earn money from your hunts to invest in better gear, gather materials to enhance your sled, and expand your team of loyal dogs. Meet new breeds and form lasting bonds with your canine companions, whether through trade or by completing special tasks to win their trust.

UNRAVEL THE SECRETS OF YOUR HERITAGE

Yakutia is a land of legend, and its tales intertwine with your family’s mysterious past. As you complete quests and connect with the locals, you’ll uncover the truth about your father’s disappearance, your family’s noble rise, and the whispers of immortality that surround the Trofimov name.

MYTHS AND REALITY COLLIDE IN THE FROZEN NORTH

Immerse yourself in a world where the rich culture of the Yakut people comes alive. Encounter spirits from ancient folklore, face the terrifying abaasy demons, and navigate a land where nature and myth exist in delicate balance.

ANSWER THE CALL

Explore the breathtaking yet treacherous landscapes of northern Yakutia. Test your courage against the unforgiving elements, forge bonds with the people and animals of this frozen land, and uncover the ultimate truth hidden in the enigmatic Sannikov Land.

short_description: Embark on an adventure through the vast northern wilderness, where survival depends on your skills and instincts. Experience story-rich exploration as you dredge through untamed lands, face below zero temperatures, and uncover mysteries hidden in the snow. A journey into the long dark awaits!
